page.title: 01INTRODUCTION TO OUR D_BLOCK.
page.content: Our Domesday block is situated in a rural area and contains part of the village of Ayelsham, and the smaller villages of Nonington, Barfreston, Frogham,Elvington and Snowdown. It is in the south east of Kent close to Dover ,the busiest ferry port in the British Isles, and the cathedral city of Canterbury. There is very little industry and many of the inhabitants work at the collieries or on the land. The villages of Elvington and Aylesham were built at the begining of this century to house the miners from Snowdown and Tilmanstone Collieries. At the centre of the area is Fredville Estate which covers about 2000 acres and consists of woodland parkland and recreational parkland.
